name: Javascript
description: This is the only course you need. All your life's dreams will come true when you take the Javscript course. I think I saw Jesus taking this course.

name: Ruby on Rails
description: This is a really good course. There are many like this course, but this one is ours. So many cool kids take this course.

name: PHP
description: This is a good intro course. Most of the web is written in PHP. If you want international contract work you should take this course.

name: Java
description: This is a course for old people. It's not javscript. It's pretty neat if you like old, nostalgic stuff.
